They used the tags for the whole tankoubon instead of what's actually shown in this upload. In the full story the guy cheats on his girlfriend with her mom and then the mom's friend joins them. That's where the threesome tag comes from. The cheating and NTR tags come from the fact that both the guy is cheating on his girlfriend with the mom and the mom is cheating on her husband with the guy. Don't know about the friend's situation based on skimming through untranslated pages. Looks like the daughter and husband find out but the daughter forgives the mom and gets married to someone else so everyone gets a happy ending except the husband. Before anyone freaks out about the mom cheating on the guy in the extra stories note that the women in the first story only has one beauty mark and the woman in the last story has no beauty marks. I know they look the same but they're different.
This is so amazing and freaking hot! I'm waiting for next chapters in English. This is 7 chapter story if I'm not wrong.
